extendedInfo.description: NOW YOU CAN SYNC WITH OUR ONLINE VERSION ATwww.mybudget-planner.com/onlineKnow in advance when you will be out of funds. Budget Planner is the only app that helps you forecast your balance on a calendar and sync your budget between your family, friends and partners on their iPhone, iPod & iPad. Read FAQS to enhance performance BP distinguishes itself from the other budget apps because of its unique Balance Forecast System and the 18 useful tools that are packed with. If you check the top finance apps, you will notice there is a bill reminder app, a tip, mortgage and loan calculator app, an account app, and so forth. What we have done is combine all this tools and added several more based on customerâs request. BP includes: BALANCE FORECAST No more overdraft fees. No more guessing when your balance will be negative. BP will display your balance in a calendar view so you know exactly how much money you will have on any particular day, week or month. BUDGET SYNC, BACKUP, RESTORE (optional) Sync your budget between your friends and family on their iPad, iPhone, or iPod with our new budget syncing add-on. 3.99 for 3 Months, 5.99 for 6M, 9.99 for a year. TRANSACTIONS ON THE FLY No more 3 or 4 clicks to enter a category. Just use our new and unique scroll to make entries on the fly. MONEY TRANSFERS Now you will be able to move money from one account to the other by just selecting transfer from the scroll. BUDGET TRACKING Our new budget tool will help you set a goal and maintain your expenses under budget. It will also show you how much money you are saving each month. PLOT The new plot graph will help you easily visualize the days your balance is at risk or anticipate the perfect time to buy that special gift for your spouse or children. SPREADSHEET This tool will help you browse through all your transactions 6 months in advance, and all within one screen. BILL REMINDERS You will be able to assign reminders to your bills and receive notifications for when they are due; this will help you avoid late fees. 5 CALCULATORS Ever wonder how much will your total be after sales tax/ discounts, not to mention the tap on a restaurant? With our 5-in-1 calculator (Tip, Sales Tax, Discount, Mortgage, and Loan calculator with amortization table) you will be in control of your expenses. TRANSACTION SCHEDULING Our new report screen will help you access all your current and upcoming transactions with a click of a button. No more remembering or writing a pay bill list. No more figuring out what expenses are on auto pay or recurring. With BP you will be able to schedule your income, expenses, and bills based on date and frequency of your choice and know exactly how much money you have on any given day. CHARTS & REPORTS Would you like to know what expenses are the ones taking most of your income? BP analyzes your data and builds pie charts and bar charts by category and amount. This report will help you adjust your budget so you can take that vacation you wanted or buy that expensive gift for your loved ones. EXPORTABLE DATA What about archiving and analyzing all your expenses trends? With BP you can! Just click the export button on the report screen and your data will be sent to your email. Then all you have to do is open the file in any spreadsheet software (Mac/PC) ACCOUNT MANAGEMENT Need more than 5,6,7,8â¦ Just click the plus sign on the account section and create as many personal or business accounts you may need. TRANSACTION FEATURES Sometimes we forget where we spend our money, and having the word utility or restaurant just doesnât help us remember. With our new âwrite notes and memos featureâ you wonât need to remember. You will also be able to create your own category and icon using your device camera. CUSTOMIZABLE SETTINGS Pass code protection, Account management, Home screen selector, Push notifications, and more.bills,cash flow,weekly,balance,credit card,bill,expenses,debt,finances,pay

reviews.title: Works as advertised
reviews.comment: Great budget app. This app has saved me from bad spending a bunch a times so it paid for itself.  you can see when you will or won\'t have money weeks in advance to make paying bills a lot easier. Mainly I just check my bank balance then use the adjustment feature if you don\'t wanna enter every single transaction. Haven\'t even touched quicken since I got this.
reviews.author: Norman Richardson

reviews.title: Fast response from the developer
reviews.comment: Thanks for the fast response.  How do i change my password inside the app?
reviews.author: Dexter Sta. Cruz

reviews.title: Wasted!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Input a lot of info then summary field prompted an error... uninstall it and now ill try if it will be fix. Devastated... wasted my time. :/
reviews.author: Krystabell Marie

reviews.title: A
reviews.comment: Gets the job done.
reviews.author: Ruben Blanco

reviews.title: Good concept, but....
reviews.comment: You could lose a days work setting up your budget, only to find the app deletes most of your info. And, syncing across devices? That seems to exacerbate the deleting issue. Have contacted the dev in regards to this, as well as some other thoughts on the app, but this issue was completely ignored in my reply email from them. Nice app, nice layout, forecasting, quite easy to navigate, but what good is it if it doesn\'t keep info stored?
reviews.author: Kevin Chapman

reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY AWESOME!!
reviews.comment: This app is outstanding!  It shows cumulative values over the calendar and includes lots of options you would expect from professional budget management software.  Easy to use, configurable, multiple accounts, custom categories, see account standings each day of the calendar, etc.  Best $2 budget software I\'ve purchased to date.  Totally worth it!!
reviews.author: Joe Scarr

reviews.title: Great idea, but doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Oh so wanted this to work, only app i found with the Calendar feature I was looking for.  Worked for a minute, but now can\'t even get into the dashboard online! Also transactions disappear, won\'t synch. Contacted the developer about not getting into dashboard, was told they were looking into it. That was over a month ago. Contacted them again about a refund and they told me to request a refund from itunes? Then followed that with an email asking if I installed the latest update? what does that have to do with not being able to sign into the dashboard from a PC? ridiculous!! Enjoy your, I mean MY money for nothing!  Thanks..
reviews.author: K Martin

reviews.title: Good Start, Needs Development
reviews.comment: I have been using this for about 3 hours and have finally set up my main income and expenses. This app is easy to use but has a few bugs ranging from the \"Wen\" abbreviation for Wednesday to problems entering in decimals in some transactions including the calculator. These problems can result in major balance errors over time.
reviews.author: James Hart

reviews.title: Good start - the potential is there, the execution
reviews.comment: Fun. At first I was excited. Easy to put income and expenses. But how to see how income had? You can not. It got stuck many times. You can not see outlays by category selected. You buy something in payments? No. And much more ...  Many advantages but more downsides.  Removed.
reviews.author: Sh Lo

reviews.title: Budget Planner
reviews.comment: This app really stood out for me with the calendar view. I looked at a few before deciding to purchase. First thing I did is rename/delete/add the groups and sub groups and create a Cash Account. I didn\'t read any instructions, but within half an hour I was hooked. It really is a great little app that is easy to use. No problems on my nexus 7. Emailed a couple of suggestions on changes like date format living in the UK, dd-mm-yy, but nothing that\'s major. Great app. No regrets.
reviews.author: Stephen Hill

reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTING!
reviews.comment: This is the only app I can find that has the features I want. Too bad it doesn\'t work. I had extremely fast response from the developer when I first contacted them, but they were unable to get any fixes to work, and then made constant excuses for themselves...\"I\'m the only developer\". Well then perhaps you should stick with one app until you get it right!    I paid for both the ipad and android versions, neither of them work correctly and they definitely don\'t sync up. But neither one even works correctly on it\'s own, without trying to sync them up. If you edit a transaction, it both creates the new expense and keeps the old one in the list. If they\'re recurring, that means the budget winds up wanting to pay my electric bill 17 times per month by next April!    I\'m very very disappointed. This developer needs to learn that apps should be free until they work!
reviews.author: Joy Wright

reviews.title: 5 stars to  0 star
reviews.comment: I was looking for this type of budget app for longtime and I thought  finally  I got this  when I used for  a month. Now I am going to switch to app I used before. Becouse I can\'t trust any more lost entries missing showing wrong balances ............. So money problem .
reviews.author: jeyaveerasingam jeyakanthan

reviews.title: Change my mind
reviews.comment: Too complicated and don\'t like a t first But great customer service and I change my mind :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Scam
reviews.comment: Pay and then pay more?  Missed the refund cut off by seconds. Enjoy your money, you won\'t be getting any more from me!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mr
reviews.comment: Great tool for mobile devices, easy to use and has a spread sheet incorporated. A good aid for tracking finance outside the standard calendar month. One small point, can this app be updated for lge tablets in landscape mode.
reviews.author: Eddie McCue

reviews.title: Keeps crashing and won\'t sync
reviews.comment: I love the app and it was doing well for me for about a week. Now it keeps crashing and I can no longer download/sync my data with their web version. I love how it forecasts my balances on calendar view but for now, until a new update is out with the fixes I rate this app 3 stars since I love it but I can\'t use it because it won\'t let me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: It worked for awhile, but got all buggy and stopped.  Im also subscribed to his online service for syncing and multiple devices. It just doesn\'t work. If you have a lot of data to enter this app is a bad idea, but I guess if you had 10 bills why would you need this.
reviews.author: John Wheeler

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: Works great, easy to use, absolutely everything I was looking for in a budgeting app. I wanted something to replace my quicken and i got it.
reviews.author: Trevor Hawkins

reviews.title: Semi Monthly
reviews.comment: This app would be awesome if there was a semi-minthly period added. Please add this new feature and the app will be awesome. Thank you.
reviews.author: Julie Flanders

reviews.title: Really like the concept
reviews.comment: Awesome concept doesn\'t seem to work properly. Sync not working for me and it force closes a lot. Looking forward to the next update!
reviews.author: A Google User
